ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chains Reliability
ygData.msgSnippet: I got him by accident 2 weeks ago.  Gotta love tracking ;p  Just happened to be in S Ro, took a quick look and wow!  Gave the ring to my cleric friend who was
ygData.messageBody:
I got him by accident 2 weeks ago. Gotta love tracking ;p Just happened to
be in S Ro, took a quick look and wow! Gave the ring to my cleric friend
who was along. Have to get 2 more rings. One for my wizard to make him
some booties and another for him to wear for the stats, heh. Warrior friend
spent 4 days there over 2 weekends. Got KS'd 3 times before she got her
ring. I have this irresitable urge to turn in 325pp too. Heh.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 10:03 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Chains Reliability


> From: <kim@...>
>

specific.

cleric
